destination.sdc:description: This is intended to be a set of one or more submission rules that pertain to this version of the form.

mdr3:document_type.mdr3:description: a description of the style language used in the form design
a description of the logic document
a description of the format document

organization.name: Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality (AHRQ)

designation.sign: ADRENAL GLAND: Biopsy (Core Needle, Incisional, Excisional); Resection

section_title.mfi13:label: ADRENAL GLAND: Biopsy (Core Needle, Incisional, Excisional); Resection

additional_instruction.mfi13:label: Protocol applies to adrenal cortical carcinoma only. Cortical adenomas, pheochromocytoma, neuroblastic tumors, and adrenal tumors of childhood are not included.

sdc:additional_instruction.label: repeat section if more than one part
applicable to carcinomas treated with neoadjuvant therapy
Note: There is no category of carcinoma in situ (pTis) relative to carcinomas of the adrenal gland.

item_prompt.label: pT0: No evidence of primary tumor
pT1: Tumor 5 cm or less in greatest dimension, no extra-adrenal invasion
pT2: Tumor greater than 5 cm, no extra-adrenal invasion

additional_instruction.label: # Adjacent organs include kidney, diaphragm, great vessels, pancreas, and liver.

item_prompt.label: pT3: Tumor of any size with local invasion, but not invading adjacent organs#
pT4: Tumor of any size with invasion of adjacent organs#
pN0: No regional lymph node metastasis
